intro: Create a feline paradise and turn an old mansion into a house full of adorable cats! Everyone loves cute little kittens!
description:
Do you love cats? Then "PAWfect Cat Mansion" is the perfect game for you! Design your dream home and watch as adorable cats appear, exploring and lounging in your beautifully decorated rooms. Create unique spaces tailored to different professions by choosing furniture and decorations that match each character's interests.

Your main goal is to transform an old mansion into a cozy kitty paradise. Invite even more cute cats to join the fun, and pick your favorites to stay with you forever!

Features:
• Design themed rooms for various characters to unlock new decorations.
• Decorate your mansion with a wide range of furniture and accessories.
• Attract a variety of cats with your cozy spaces.
• Choose your favorite cats to stay in your home forever!
